p: Other constituents are tannic acid, which is about 1.3%, as well as polysaccharides and proteins representing approximately 4% [ 58, 68, 73, 74, 75, 76, 77, 78]. Nazir et al. (2016) have found that the T. occidentalis leaf methanolic extract contains 135.32 mg/g total polyphenols expressed in gallic acid equivalent and 3.46 mg/g of total flavonoids expressed in quercitin equivalent [ 36].
